title: Located in Mountains Edge!
posting_body: ["Tucked away in Southwest Las Vegas Mountain's Edge neighborhood, Mountain Gate & Mountain Trails are here to offer residents a fresh take on luxury living.", 'Updated with modern finishes and designer touches, our 1 & 2 bedroom apartments for rent near Exploration Peak Park supply just the retreat youve been searching for.', '-Mountain Views', '-Close to the Las Vegas Strip', '-Two Outdoor Lounges with Fireplace', '-Green Globes Certified', '-Two Vibrant Clubhouses with Plasma TV/DVD Player and Java Bar', '-Expansive Community Walking and Biking Path to Exploration Park', '-Move-in Deposit Free with Jetty', '-Regular Community Events with Friendly Staff', '-Elevator Access in Select Buildings', '-Poolside Barbecue Grills with Seating', "-Located in Mountain's Edge Master Planned Community", '-Living Green Community Featuring On-Site Recycling Program', 'Call:', 'show contact info', 'For more information, visit us at: <URL>', '*Equal housing opportunity*']
